words.source: H559 wayyiqtol 3ms Qal of אָמַר 'to say'; KJV 'said', ESV 'said', NASB 'said'
H6547 proper name; all trans. agree
H595 pron. 1cs ʾanoki 'I'; KJV 'I', ESV 'I', NASB 'I'
H7971 Piel impf. 1cs of שָׁלַח 'to send'; KJV 'will let you go', ESV 'will let you go', NASB 'will let you go'
H853 direct object marker + 2mp suff.; KJV 'you', ESV 'you', NASB 'you'
H2076 conj. + Qal perf. 2mp of זָבַח 'to sacrifice'; KJV 'that ye may sacrifice', ESV 'to sacrifice', NASB 'that you may sacrifice'
H3068 prep. l- + divine name; KJV 'unto the LORD', ESV 'to the LORD', NASB 'to the LORD'
H430 n.mp construct ʾelohim 'God' + 2mp suff.; KJV 'your God', ESV 'your God', NASB 'your God'
H4057 prep. b- + art. + n.ms midbar 'wilderness, desert'; KJV 'in the wilderness', ESV 'in the wilderness', NASB 'in the wilderness'
H7535 adv. raq 'only, surely'; KJV 'only', ESV 'only', NASB 'only'
H7368 Hiphil inf. abs. of רָחַק 'to be far'; KJV 'far away', ESV 'far', NASB 'far'
H3808 neg. particle loʾ 'not'; KJV 'ye shall not', ESV 'you must not', NASB 'you shall not'
H7368 Hiphil impf. 2mp of רָחַק 'to be far, go far'; KJV 'go very far away', ESV 'go very far away', NASB 'go very far away'
H3212 prep. l- + Qal inf. construct of יָלַךְ 'to go'; KJV 'to go', ESV 'away', NASB 'away'
H6279 Hiphil imv. 2mp of עָתַר 'to pray, entreat'; KJV 'intreat', ESV 'plead', NASB 'make supplication'
H1157 prep. baʿad 'for, on behalf of' + 1cs suff.; KJV 'for me', ESV 'for me', NASB 'for me'
